name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

name: $issued
desc: Returns: When this Contract Provision was issued.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: When this Contract Provision was issued.

name: $applies
desc: Returns: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract Provision is applicable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract Provision is applicable.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: A legal clause or condition contained within a contract that requires one or both parties to perform a particular requirement by some specified time or prevents one or both parties from performing a particular requirement by some specified time.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A legal clause or condition contained within a contract that requires one or both parties to perform a particular requirement by some specified time or prevents one or both parties from performing a particular requirement by some specified time.

name: $subType
desc: Returns: A specialized legal clause or condition based on overarching contract type.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A specialized legal clause or condition based on overarching contract type.

name: $text
desc: Returns: Statement of a provision in a policy or a contract.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Statement of a provision in a policy or a contract.

name: $securityLabel
desc: Returns: Security labels that protect the handling of information about the term and its elements, which may be specifically identified..

name: $addsecurityLabel
desc: Security labels that protect the handling of information about the term and its elements, which may be specifically identified..

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Security labels that protect the handling of information about the term and its elements, which may be specifically identified..

name: $offer
desc: Returns: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.

name: $action
desc: Returns: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

name: $addaction
desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.
